ValidationRule.description: If a CPE product is selected than a value must be entered for how it affected the MRR for the Opportunity. This can be a + or - value. If a negative value than value must be preceeded by a minus (-) sign.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This is a CPE related opportunity. The affected MRR must be entered. It can be either a + or - value. If negative than preceed the Value by a minus (-) sign.
